data.text: @blakandblack If it looks like a cult, sounds like a cult and kills like a cult, is it a cult?
@susan_jackson60 I wonder if it’s also effective against the common cold?
@blakandblack I’m not sure how long that protection will last.

@SammieMacM If when I die I meet Zeus, or Thor, or a Sumerian deity, alls cool because none of them ever promised to be a friend to humanity. They just are what they are. If I happen to meet the Judeo-Christian GD, I’ll be giving him/her/it an earful about spinning 🐂 💩 and not delivering.
@MissPolly62 @PeterMulvahill All religions fanatics regardless of their belief system are looney.
@ChadHen13929561 Ummm 🤔 not sure I want to go there.
